definition[0]: to become very successful or very strong and healthy
example[0]: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
example[1]: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say do well rather than thrive:
example[2]: The whole family seems to be doing well.
definition[1]: if a company, market, or place is thriving, it is very successful and making a lot of money
example[3]: Our natural food supermarkets are thriving.
